topic: Describe a positive change in your life
bullets: Explain why it was a positive change

topic: Describe an activity you do to stay healthy
bullets: When and where you usually do it
Explain why you think it is good for your health

topic: Describe a time when you had to wait for something special
bullets: What you did while you were waiting
Explain how you felt when the wait was over

topic: Describe a piece of good news you heard recently
bullets: Who told you (or where you read it)
Explain why this news made you happy

topic: Describe something you bought that you were pleased with
bullets: Explain why you were pleased with this purchase

topic: Describe a performance you watched (e.g., concert, play, dance)
bullets: When and where you watched it

topic: Describe a person who is full of energy
bullets: Why you think they are full of energy
Explain how you feel when you are with them

topic: Describe a time you lost something important
bullets: What you did to find it
Explain how you felt about losing it
